desc.en: Upon meeting Asuna in a bunny girl costume, Sensei sees Asuna drop what appears to be the safety pin for her grenade. Sensei follows Asuna to put it back, but Asuna thinks they're playing tag and starts running away.
desc.jp: Upon meeting Asuna in a bunny girl costume, Sensei sees Asuna drop what appears to be the safety pin for her grenade. Sensei follows Asuna to put it back, but Asuna thinks they're playing tag and starts running away.

desc.en: Despite their best effort to meet up with Himari on time, Sensei ends up getting roped into all sorts of accidents. After just barely overcoming these setbacks, Sensei realizes that it was all planned by Himari in an attempt to test Sensei based on something she saw in a horoscope magazine. Upon learning the truth, Sensei reads Himari the riot act.

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department and Sensei put their heads together to come up with ideas for their new game. When Momoi and Midori fail to find common ground, they decide to settle things once and for all using a method passed down in the Game Development Department through generations. Meanwhile, Yuzu gives Aris a quest to help her find inspiration. Aris ponders how to proceed with the quest when she decides to go on an adventure at the school with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}和老师正在苦思要加入游戏新作的创意。{cf桃井}和{cf绿}的意见发生分歧，两人为了做出最后的结论，于是决定使用{cn游戏开发部}代代相传的方式决胜负。另一方面，{cf柚子}为了让{cf爱丽丝}能获得特别的灵感，于是给了她任务。苦思该如何运行任务的{cf爱丽丝}决定先和老师一起去学园冒险。

desc.en: The Game Development Department started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department started discussing about the game. From the mechanics of the dungeon, to the weapon and arsenal, as well as the art and manifestations. Midori was in great dissatisfaction due to how much emphasis did Momoi put on art. And with the fact that she often changed ideas, many art resources were discarded too. The twins forced Sensei to make a decision.
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}众人开始讨论游戏的具体形式。从地牢的机制到武器装备，以及美术和表现形式之类。因为{cf桃井}过于强调美术而又常常易稿，许多美术资源都被废弃，引来妹妹{cf绿}的非常不满。两人强迫老师做出一个选择。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.jp: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的{cf堇}。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后{cf爱丽丝}为了继续进行冒险而离开。{cf爱丽丝}在校外遇见了穿着校服的{cf明日奈}和{cf花凛}，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到{cf宁瑠}在找{cf爱丽丝}的消息后，{cf爱丽丝}立刻前往{sn其他}地方。

desc.en: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.jp: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}和老师在校园走着，来到了田径跑道。{cf爱丽丝}突然听见了奇怪的声音，认为是“遇敌事件”，结果原来是{cf堇}。{cf堇}和{cf爱丽丝}交谈了几句，互相交换了关于运动的好处之类。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.jp: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}和{sn千年}的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和{cn工程师部}见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来{cf爱丽丝}遇见{cf宁瑠}，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在{cf爱丽丝}也能笑着说{cf宁瑠}是自己的同伴。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}在{sn千年}广场遇到了{sn其他}{sn千年}的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途{cf爱丽丝}还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Aris met the three of the Engineering Department. The three said they were out seeking for some new equipments. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.

desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}叫{cf宁瑠}“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和{cf爱丽丝}到了游戏厅。不出所料，{cf宁瑠}不断输给了{cf爱丽丝}，尽管{cf爱丽丝}已经教了她相当一段时间。{cf宁瑠}虽然非常恼火{cf爱丽丝}评价她的水平不好，但还是请教{cf爱丽丝}连招的操作。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.zh_cn: 老师对{cf爱丽丝}居然不害怕{cf宁瑠}感到惊讶，而{cf爱丽丝}则表示是因为{cf宁瑠}现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解{cf爱丽丝}的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成{cf柚子}布置的任务，但{cf爱丽丝}还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。

desc.en: Himari said that the Eridu City had been sealed and the things afterwards would be handled by her.

desc.en: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.jp: Rio decided to step down as the president after this incident. Though in great shock, Yuuka could only find a note left by the President, with "I'm sorry" on it.
desc.zh_cn: {cf莉音}在此事后决定卸任会长一职，{cf优香}大为震撼。会长走前只留下了一条“对不起”的纸条。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.jp: C&C invited Sensei to the party to celebrate the recovery of the president Neru. Asuna purposed the idea of "Bunny Suit". As the president disappeared, Toki attended the party and became a member of C&C.
desc.zh_cn: {cnC&C}邀请了老师前来参加聚会，庆祝部长{cf宁瑠}康复出院。{cf明日奈}提出了兔女郎装的主意。{cf季}因为会长失踪，所以也来参加了聚会，并成为{cnC&C}的一员。

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.jp: Sensei was called by the Game Development Department. The four said they were developing a new games, as they weren't able to come up more ideas for the old one. Aris invited Sensei to try with them, and everyone started the game happily. The story will go on and never stops.
desc.zh_cn: 老师被叫到了{cn游戏开发部}，众人表示老师正在开发一款新的游戏，因为之前的那个无法继续扩展思路。{cf爱丽丝}邀请老师一起尝试，众人在愉快的氛围下开始了游戏。故事仍在续写中。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.jp: [An MV is playing in this part. The BGM was the ending song for the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department. Considering that most images in the videos are actually a part of the in-game backgrounds, therefore we'll be listing as much as backgrounds as we can.]
desc.zh_cn: 【此处为过场视频播放，背景音乐为游戏部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》的片尾曲。由于视频中的图片素材大多在游戏内存在，因而背景一栏将尽量给出具体的图片】

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: 貝裡塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中準備了自爆程式。但生命守護者早已被敵人駭入了。奇普託斯的天空再次染紅且陷入絕望當中，白子和老師抵達了駭入生命守護者的位置，在那邊遇見了誘騙者和另一個白子。
desc.jp: 貝裡塔斯在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中準備了自爆程式。但生命守護者早已被敵人駭入了。奇普託斯的天空再次染紅且陷入絕望當中，白子和老師抵達了駭入生命守護者的位置，在那邊遇見了誘騙者和另一個白子。
desc.zh_cn: {cn贝里塔斯}在阿特拉哈西斯方舟中准备了自爆程序。但生命守护者早已被敌人骇入了。奇普托斯的天空再次染红且陷入绝望当中，{cf白子}和老师抵达了骇入生命守护者的位置，在那边遇见了诱骗者和另一个{cf白子}。

desc.en: 就在即將啟動時，莉音突然意識到方舟的狀態很不對勁，她立刻讓陽葵注意――情況表明，生命守護者本艦已被駭入。
desc.jp: 就在即將啟動時，莉音突然意識到方舟的狀態很不對勁，她立刻讓陽葵注意――情況表明，生命守護者本艦已被駭入。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.en: 船上，優香向陽葵詢問情況，陽葵則表示他們中了敵人的計：在他們佔領方舟時，敵人也在反向駭入生命守護者艦艇並已成功。優香表示這必須透過物理手段達到，但並沒有人來過這——除了一個人。
desc.jp: 船上，優香向陽葵詢問情況，陽葵則表示他們中了敵人的計：在他們佔領方舟時，敵人也在反向駭入生命守護者艦艇並已成功。優香表示這必須透過物理手段達到，但並沒有人來過這——除了一個人。
desc.zh_cn: 船上，{cf优香}向{cf阳葵}询问情况，{cf阳葵}则表示他们中了敌人的计：在他们占领方舟时，敌人也在反向骇入生命守护者舰艇并已成功。{cf优香}表示这必须通过物理手段达到，但并没有人来过这——除了一个人。

desc.en: 兩人記起那一位白子同學來，認定大概就是在那個時候。
desc.jp: 兩人記起那一位白子同學來，認定大概就是在那個時候。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: 陽葵同時表示，現在他們不僅喪失對戰艦的控制，戰艦甚至還在協助方舟進行多次元詮釋。她警告說，這樣聖塔很有可能再度出現。
desc.jp: 陽葵同時表示，現在他們不僅喪失對戰艦的控制，戰艦甚至還在協助方舟進行多次元詮釋。她警告說，這樣聖塔很有可能再度出現。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}同时表示，现在他们不仅丧失对战舰的控制，战舰甚至还在协助方舟进行多次元诠释。她警告说，这样圣塔很有可能再度出现。

desc.en: 白子遇見了誘騙者，她大喊他就是將她綁架的人。白子讓誘騙者不要輕舉妄動，畢竟夏萊的老師可是也在場上。誘騙者沒做什麼，說出了啟動箱子的密碼。白子立刻開槍。
desc.jp: 白子遇見了誘騙者，她大喊他就是將她綁架的人。白子讓誘騙者不要輕舉妄動，畢竟夏萊的老師可是也在場上。誘騙者沒做什麼，說出了啟動箱子的密碼。白子立刻開槍。
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}遇见了诱骗者，她大喊他就是将她绑架的人。{cf白子}让诱骗者不要轻举妄动，毕竟{et夏莱}的老师可是也在场上。诱骗者没做什么，说出了启动箱子的密码。{cf白子}立刻开枪。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: 一片煙中，白子發現子彈全部沒有命中，令她大為震驚。這時，老師聽見了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是對方的，箱子。
desc.jp: 一片煙中，白子發現子彈全部沒有命中，令她大為震驚。這時，老師聽見了自己和疑似彩奈的名字――是對方的，箱子。
desc.zh_cn: 一片烟中，{cf白子}发现子弹全部没有命中，令她大为震惊。这时，老师听见了自己和疑似{cf彩奈}的名字――是对方的，箱子。

desc.en: A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的修復程式啟動，並且被入侵的生命守護者也將在800秒後啟動最終自爆程式。另一位白子向老師冷冰冰地宣告基沃託斯迎向終結的不可避性，並對著誘騙者稱呼老師的名字。
desc.jp: A.R.O.N.A.宣佈方舟的修復程式啟動，並且被入侵的生命守護者也將在800秒後啟動最終自爆程式。另一位白子向老師冷冰冰地宣告基沃託斯迎向終結的不可避性，並對著誘騙者稱呼老師的名字。
desc.zh_cn: A.R.O.N.A.宣布方舟的修复程序启动，并且被入侵的生命守护者也将在800秒后启动最终自爆程序。另一位{cf白子}向老师冷冰冰地宣告基沃托斯迎向终结的不可避性，并对着诱骗者称呼老师的名字。

desc.en: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.jp: Phrenapates is an adult appeared in the Volume Final. He has the very same power with Sensei, and is considered to be the Sensei himself being in another timeline, in which the Kivotos had fallen for some reasons. The "Phrenapates" is, according to Shiroko (Terror, from that timeline), dead and was transformed by the Iridescence.
desc.zh_cn: 诱骗者是个在终章中出现的大人。他拥有与老师完全一样的能力，一般被视作为另一时间线上（基沃托斯莫名毁灭）的老师。根据白子（恐怖）的说法，“诱骗者”其实已经死亡，其当时的状态是因为色彩转化。

desc.en: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.jp: Plana is the very AI that manages the Shittem Chest, basically an "early version" of Arona. Arona and Plana has a unique relationship, for Arona could be the GSC President herself, and Plana was created by her first.
desc.zh_cn: 星奈（民间音译为“普拉娜”）是老师平板的AI管理员，基本上可被视作为彩奈的“早期版本”。彩奈和星奈之间的关系非同寻常，因为前者似乎就是联邦学生会会长她自己，而后者则正由会长所创造。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。

desc.en: The festival concludes safely. Fubuki and Kirino are frustrated that Wakamo slipped away. Sena says that she's looking forward to patrolling together again. Chihiro stops by to apologize for not being much help before leaving. Wakamo invades Schale just as things are settling down.
desc.jp: The festival concludes safely. Fubuki and Kirino are frustrated that Wakamo slipped away. Sena says that she's looking forward to patrolling together again. Chihiro stops by to apologize for not being much help before leaving. Wakamo invades Schale just as things are settling down.
desc.zh_cn: 就这样，情人节庆典圆满地画下了句点。就在{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}为了{cf若藻}再次逃脱的事气得牙痒痒的同时，{cf瀬奈}告诉老师自己会一直期待和老师一起巡逻的机会再次到来，而赶来找他们的{cf千寻}则为了自己没能帮上忙的事向老师道歉。就在学生们纷纷离开，而众人也以为骚动彻底落幕的时候，{cf若藻}闯入了{et夏莱}。

desc.en: The Halo Festival is just around the corner, and Yuuka and Noa reach out to Sensei when they experience one unexpected setback after another. Concerned that Yuuka is biting off more than she can chew to prepare for the event, Noa secretly asks Sensei for help with the field day's preparations.
desc.jp: The Halo Festival is just around the corner, and Yuuka and Noa reach out to Sensei when they experience one unexpected setback after another. desc.zh_cn: 老师从{cn研讨会}的{cf优香}和{cf乃爱}那里听说将要举办「晄轮大祭」，但却发生了意料之外的事故。庆典迫在眉前，{cf乃爱}担心{cf优香}太勉强自己，于是便背着{cf优香}拜托老师帮忙准备大运动会。

desc.en: Yuuka wakes up from her herbal tea-induced slumber in a panic. She tracks down Noa, and soon realizes that her fellow students had worked tirelessly through the night to complete the Halo Festival preparations so she could rest. She thanks Sensei and Noa, and the Kivotos Halo Festival begins!
desc.jp: Yuuka wakes up from her herbal tea-induced slumber in a panic. She tracks down Noa, and soon realizes that her fellow students had worked tirelessly through the night to complete the Halo Festival preparations so she could rest. She thanks Sensei and Noa, and the Kivotos Halo Festival begins!
desc.zh_cn: 从睡梦中惊醒的{cf优香}慌忙赶到现场，这才发现其他{sn千年}学园的学生在自己熟睡的时候，帮忙准备大运动会。{cf优香}向帮助自己的{cf乃爱}和老师道谢……「晄轮大祭」顺利开幕。

The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.jp: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.
desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。
